name: Hdd-test-ubuntu
tagline: Test HDD speed on Ubuntu Linux 16.04LTS
body:
# HDD Test
Test HDD speed on Linux
This is created and tested on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS!
Server used: DEDIBOXÂ® XC 2016 from online. This simple script will Test the following on sda:
1. What sata busspeed is enabled
2. Disk Read speed 3 times
3. Disk Write speed 3 times
Please run as root :)!
Download with:
wget -q https://raw.githubusercontent.com/maestroi/hddtest/master/hddtest.sh
Example:
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
